issue.title: consider narrowing drcsim's version dependency on gazebo

content.raw:
Agreed, upgrading gazebo breaking drcsim it is something to avoid.

The root of the problem seems to be in an ABI breakage, something (API and ABI) to slowly start to consider if we want user not to run away with every update.

Looks sane for the moment to start making one and one relation drcsim <-> gazebo.
